medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrent fever for 15 years, accompanied by chilliness, fatigue, myalgia, and arthralgia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began 15 years ago with recurrent episodes lasting 10 days each. There is an absence of chest pain, abdominal pain, conjunctivitis, hearing loss, or headache. Symptoms include chilliness, fatigue, myalgia, and arthralgia.
medical_history.family_history: Father had interstitial lung disease and passed away at age 73 years; mother died of myocardial infarction at age 60 years. No similar symptoms in other family members.
